creditsInspire: Game inspired by "Demon Girl" from LineMarvel
achVictoryNoHSceneDesc: Complete a level without triggering any lewd scene
achVictoryNoClothDamageDesc: Complete a level without loosing any cloth
achVictoryFullPowerDesc: Complete a level without using spells
achVictoryPerfectDesc: Complete a level without triggering any lewd scene nor loosing cloth, and without using your spells
achMaxSpeedDesc: Stay at max speed for 3 seconds without hitting an enemy
achAllHScenesDesc: Trigger a lewd scene with every kind of enemy in the level 4
achEdgingDesc: Exit a lewd scene with the orgasm bar at more than 95%
achAllAlive4PDesc: Complete a level with 4 players without anyone dying
achAllNude4PDesc: Have everyone naked on a game with 4 players
achOrgasmFullClothDesc: Reach an orgasm while still having all your clothes
